Wellbeing through Events

The aim of this module is to provide students with a comprehensive understanding of the intersection between event management and the principles of wellbeing. This module will explore the concepts of wellbeing and its relevance in planning, organising and executing events. Students will gain valuable insights into creating events that prioritise the physical, mental and emotional health of participants and will draw upon academic theory and contemporary case studies from across events, sport, leisure and tourism.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Understand the concept of wellbeing and its physical, mental, emotional and social dimension

+  Identify models and theories of wellbeing and apply them to the events industry

+  Have an awareness of the fundamental skills of event planning, design and organisation.

+  Demonstrate skills in designing events that promote a positive and holistic wellbeing experience.
